Dear Arta,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Do you have any updates on the matter below?

 

We are in the process of renewing our insurance policies for the UAE, and the outstanding balance of EV Lab is impacting the Chalhoub account.

 

I would appreciate it if you could provide a status update on the payment details so that I can relay the information to our insurer.

 

Please let me know if you need any additional information or clarification regarding the policies due for payment. 

 

Remain at your disposal for any clarification or assistance required.

 

Thank You & Kind Regards,

Hagop
